com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.intel

Class NewMessagesIntel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.intel.BaseIntelPlugin
      • com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.intel.NewMessagesIntel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IntelInfoPlugin, EveryFrameScript, CommRelayEntityPlugin.CommSnifferReadableIntel, CallEvent.CallableEvent

    public class NewMessagesIntel
extends BaseIntelPlugin
    "X new items" or whatnot message. Shown when enough new intel items would be added in a single frame that it would flood the player.
    Author:
    Alex Mosolov Copyright 2018 Fractal Softworks, LLC
